name: JPD Studio
tagline: Work closely with you to make sure you are happy.
description:
JPD Studio is an award-winning digital creative agency based in New York City. Our knowledgeable team can bring your ideas to life with our custom in-house designs, programming and marketing prowess.

We work closely with our clients – who come from all over the world and include large companies, small businesses and entrepreneurs – to create incredible designs for web, print and identity. Our projects are successful because we work closely with our clients to make sure they’re happy every step of the way.
We consider ourselves lucky to be doing the work we love – and it shows! We’re passionate about staying ahead of the curve when it comes to technology and effective design. Everything we do is made with love.
